translation.en: [narrator] The Flounders.
A ragtag team of rejects from the Valley...
translation.es: un grupo de rechazados del Valle...

translation.en: assembled for one reason
and one reason only.
-[narrator] To fail. -[thuds]
-[spits] -[narrator] But they didn't fail.
They didn't exactly succeed, -but they didn't fail. -[Tyler grunts]
translation.es: No tuvieron éxito, pero no fracasaron.

translation.en: Thanks to a technicality,
they passed the Junior Rescue Training.
Now, they'll be protecting the beaches of Malibu from Tower Two.
translation.es: Ahora, protegerán las playas de Malibúdesde la Torre Dos.

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[narrator] Tyler, the wise guy with the great hair.
translation.es: Tyler, el tipo listo con cabello perfecto.

translation.en: -Gina... -[grunts] ...the tough one.
Lizzie. Spunky, with a dark side.
translation.es: Lizzie, valiente con un lado oscuro.

translation.en: Dylan, the captain with a lot to prove.
translation.es: Dylan, la capitana con algo que probar.

translation.en: Eric, the heart of the group.
And... Tyler--
-[Gina] Hold on. -[cell phone beeps]
-You already said Tyler. -I did?
You started with him. It's way too much Tyler.
translation.es: Empezaste con él. Es demasiado Tyler.

translation.en: I think it's exactly the right amount of me.
translation.es: Creo que es la cantidad justa de mí.

translation.en: Of course you do.
"Spunky with a dark side"? I don't see it.
translation.es: ¿"Valiente con un lado oscuro"?No me parece.

translation.en: Oh! Did I tell you? My dad was mowing the lawn in his bare feet and he cut off three toes.
translation.es: ¿Saben? Mi papá cortó el césped descalzoy se cortó tres dedos.

translation.en: I asked the doctor if I could sew one on and he said maybe next time.
translation.es: Según el doctor,la próxima vez podré coserlos.

translation.en: [giggling] I really hope there's a next time!
translation.es: Solo espero que haya una próxima vez.

translation.en: Oh. "Spunky with a dark side." I hear it now.
Yo, Eric, I can't believe you made this. Where'd you get the footage?
translation.es: No puedo creerlo,¿de dónde sacaste los videos?

translation.en: Vooch shot it.
I also do weddings and bar mitzvahs.
translation.es: También filmo bodas y bar mitzvás.

translation.en: Guys, squeeze in.
I wanna get a pic of your first day as official Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.es: Quiero una foto de su primer díacomo vigilantes juveniles.

translation.en: Everybody say, "Who's driving?"
[all] Who's driving?
Wait, who is driving?
[Dylan] Where are they?
Please, please, please, don't be late on our first day!
translation.es: No lleguen tarde el primer día.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Dylan! Where's your "team"?
You know... I thought I smelled Valley trash earlier, but it turns out I was just walking by the dumpster.
translation.es: Creí que había olido basura del Valle,pero resulta que estaba junto al basurero.

translation.en: [laughing awkwardly] That's funny!
You know, they're on their way. Be here any second.
translation.es: Están en camino,llegarán en cualquier momento.

translation.en: Boop-boop! Oh, just got a text. [giggles]
-They're right around the corner. -Did you just say, "boop-boop"?
No, that's the sound my phone makes when I get a text. [laughs]
translation.es: No, mi teléfono sonóporque recibí un mensaje.

translation.en: Oh, hang on, I gotta respond.
-Click, click, click, click, click... -Your phone is wack.
Just admit it, Dylan. You can't handle being a captain. Garvin should have never given you a tower.
translation.es: Admítelo, no puedes ser capitana.Garvin no debió darte una torre.

translation.en: Hey, guys! Ready to save some lives?
Oh! Can you say it again? Eric's head was in the way.
Vooch has been filming us for weeks without our knowledge.
translation.es: Vooch nos filmaba sin que lo supiéramos.

translation.en: Oh, that's... troubling.
[gasps] All right, all right, I'm coming. I'll be right there.
translation.es: Está bien, ya voy. Ya voy.

translation.en: I'm so proud of you guys. Aw! Kill it today, okay?
No, wait! Save it.
-["Wedding March" playing] -[bus rattling]
You guys, you're here! You're officially Malibu Junior Rescue!
-Yeah! -[chuckles] Yeah! Now what?
[Dylan] Malibu Beach. Twenty-seven miles of the most beautiful coast in the world,
translation.es: Playa Malibú, 43 km de la costamás hermosa del mundo,

translation.en: and it's our job to protect all of it.
From the beach, from the water, from the air...
translation.es: Desde la playa, desde el agua,desde el aire...

translation.en: Not space. That's not really our jurisdiction.
translation.es: El espacio no. Es otra jurisdicción.

translation.en: [Brody] All right!
Welcome to the first day of Malibu Beach Junior Rescue! Come on! -[boy] In the house! -[all chattering]
translation.es: ¡Bienvenidos a su primer díacomo vigilantes juveniles de Malibú!

translation.en: [Brody] Now listen.
Our job is about more than just hangin' out at our towers and lookin' pretty.
translation.es: Nuestro trabajo es más que estaren nuestras torres y lucir bien.

translation.en: But some of us can't help it. Am I right, Tower One? -Come on. -[Tower One cheers]
translation.es: Pero algunos no podemos evitarlo.¿No, Torre Uno? Vamos.

translation.en: Junior Rescue also gets assignments each morning, and I'm the one in charge of handing them out. [laughs]
translation.es: Recibimos tareas cada mañana,y yo me encargo de repartirlas.

translation.en: Most are dope. Some are super lame. But they all gotta get done.
translation.es: Muchas son geniales, algunas no.Pero hay que hacer todo.

translation.en: So get pumped, Tower One, because I gave us ATV Patrol. -Come on! -[Tower One cheers]
translation.es: Alégrense, Torre Uno.Nos asigné la patrulla. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Everybody else... check the board. Let's go!
I wonder what assignment we got!
[sighs] This is an official Junior Rescue assignment?
I thought we were gonna rescue swimmers, scan for sharks, run in slow motion.
translation.es: Creí que rescataríamos nadadoresy correríamos en cámara lenta.

translation.en: -You know, cool stuff. -And we will.
translation.es: Creí que rescataríamos nadadoresy correríamos en cámara lenta. ¡Lo haremos!Menos correr en cámara lenta, nadie puede.

translation.en: Well, not run in slow motion. Nobody can do that.
translation.es: ¡Lo haremos!Menos correr en cámara lenta, nadie puede.

translation.en: But for right now, we have to focus on the assignment we got, and keeping the beach clean is important.
translation.es: Pero ahora tenemos esta tarea,y limpiar la playa es importante.

translation.en: I know it's not exciting or glamorous.
translation.es: Sé que no es emocionante ni glamoroso.

translation.en: You guys, I just checked Instagram, and Jiffpom was here, like, five minutes ago!
translation.es: Chicos, acabo de ver Instagramy Jiffpom estuvo aquí recién.

translation.en: Any one of these piles could be his!
Is it just me, or are there a surprising amount of turds on this beach?
translation.es: ¿Soy yo o hay demasiada cacaen esta playa?

translation.en: [Brody] Come on.
Didn't want you guys to get bored, so I restocked the beach for you, losers.
translation.es: No quería que se aburrieran,así que llené la playa, perdedores.

translation.en: He borrowed three dogs just to mess with us, and we're losers.
translation.es: Buscó perros para molestarnosy nos dice perdedores a nosotros.

translation.en: [Brody] Yes, I did.
-I'm gonna handle this. -[Dylan] Tyler, stop.
Okay? it's not worth it. Just ignore him.
Oh, hey, uh, watch your step, 'cause Tiger here ate a block
translation.es: Fíjense por donde caminan, porque Tiger comió queso cheddary no le cayó bien.

translation.en: of cheddar earlier, and it is not agreeing with him.
translation.es: porque Tiger comió queso cheddary no le cayó bien.

translation.en: Oh, not one bit. All right, have fun.
-That was some good poopin', you guys! -[dog barks]
[laughs] Yes, it was.
I hate that guy.
[Eric] Hand sanitizer for you, and you...
translation.es: Desinfectante para ti y para ti...

translation.en: and you, and me.
Lizzie, you want in on this?
No, thanks, I'm good.  Usually I think my mom's crazy for packing things like this...
translation.es: No, gracias. En general, creo que mi mamáestá loca por darme cosas así,

translation.en: but I'm lovin' it right now.
-Uh, Dylan, can you do my back? -Yeah.
translation.es: - Dylan, ¿me pasas por la espalda?- Sí.

translation.en: Well, thanks to Brody, now I have to burn these.
translation.es: Gracias a Brody, tendré que tirarlas.

translation.en: -What's his problem? -He's just trying to get to us.
translation.es: ¿Qué le pasa? - Quiere molestarnos.- Bueno, funciona.

translation.en: -Well, it's working. -Look, Dylan, you're our tower captain.
translation.es: - Quiere molestarnos.- Bueno, funciona. - Tú eres la capitana, haz algo.- Sí.

translation.en: -You have to do something. -I am.
translation.es: - Tú eres la capitana, haz algo.- Sí.

translation.en: I'm gonna take us back to our tower, and we're gonna forget all about Brody and focus on saving lives.
translation.es: Iremos a nuestra torre,olvidaremos a Brody y salvaremos vidas.

translation.en: Come on, guys, let's go.
There's my least favorite tower.
-Got a couple more jobs for you guys. -But we already did all our assignments.
translation.es: - Tengo más tareas para ustedes.- Ya terminamos.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but a couple slipped through the cracks,
translation.es: Lo sé, pero aún hay más,

translation.en: and it's up to me to make sure they get done... by you.
translation.es: y debo asegurarmede que las haga alguien: ustedes.

translation.en: Buoy maintenance? Swim fin disinfection?
It's almost like someone's giving us the worst jobs on purpose.
translation.es: Es como si alguien nos dieralas peores tareas a propósito.

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah, it is, isn't it?
That's not fair. But, it is hilarious.
translation.es: - No es justo.- Pero es muy gracioso.

translation.en: [Brody] What can I say?
When you guys humiliated us in front of the mayor, you started a war.
translation.es: Cuando nos humillaron frente al alcalde,empezaron una guerra.

translation.en: You're punishing us because we saved a life? Doy! Uh... What did you think was gonna happen?
translation.es: - ¿Nos castigas por salvar una vida?- ¡Obvio! ¿Qué creyeron que sucedería?

translation.en: I don't know, we'd be praised for our heroism and welcomed among you?
translation.es: Que elogiarían nuestro corajey nos aceptarían.

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, joke's on you, brah.
You'll never be one of us.
We all agree we gotta take that guy down, right? No, we all agree that no matter what Brody throws at us,
translation.es: - Vamos a destruirlo, ¿no?- No, no importa lo que nos haga.

translation.en: we're gonna do such a great job that even he'll have to admit we belong here.
translation.es: Haremos un trabajo tan buenoque tendrá que aceptarnos.

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe I'm saying this right now, but... Dylan's right.
translation.es: No puedo creer que diga esto,pero Dylan tiene razón.

translation.en: We want people to respect us, we have to earn it.
translation.es: Debemos ganarnos el respeto de todos.

translation.en: Yes, exactly! Take the high road.
Come on, team. Let's go scrape barnacles off the buoys.
translation.es: Vamos, equipo.Saquemos percebes de las boyas.

translation.en: Taking the high road sucks.
We earned our spot here, and you're gonna let him ruin our summer?
Forget that. We gotta fight fire with fire.
[Dylan] What does that even mean?
It means we gotta prank Brody so hard that he'll never mess with us again.
translation.es: Que haremos que Brodyno quiera meterse con nosotros.

translation.en: Tyler, everybody already thinks we don't deserve to be here!
translation.es: Tyler, ¡ya todos creenque no merecemos estar aquí!

translation.en: If we go after Brody instead of doing our job, it'll just prove them right.
translation.es: Si no hacemos nuestro trabajo,probaremos que tienen razón.

translation.en: I'm your captain, and I say we scrape buoys.
And I will, as soon as I'm done shutting Brody up. Trust me.
translation.es: Lo haré, apenas termine con Brody.Confía en mí.

translation.en: Tyler! [sighs]
I can't believe him! Can you believe him?
Actually, I gotta go with Tyler on this one.
I mean, it's classic first day of kindergarten.
translation.es: Es como el primer día de clases.

translation.en: Find the biggest kid on the yard... and take her to knuckle town.
translation.es: Buscas al niño más grande...y le das una golpiza.

translation.en: [knuckles crack] Then everybody knows you're no one's punk. Sorry, Dylan!
translation.es: Así todos sabrán que no eres débil.Lo siento, Dylan.

translation.en: This is crazy!
Pretty much.
Right, there's gotta be something in here I can use to prank Brody.
translation.es: Debe haber algoque pueda usar contra Brody.

translation.en: Ooh, hello.
Speargun. -This will totally shut him up. -[fires]
Uh, maybe something less permanent.
-[grunts, groans] -[equipment jangles]
Tyler? Tyler, are you in here?
[Tyler, grunting] Over... here.
I wanna help get back at Brody.
Whoa!
Is it bad?
[chuckles softly] It's horrible.
Then why are you smiling?
'Cause I get to take 'em out.
No, no, no. No, no, no, no. I'm good.
translation.es: No, no. No lo hagas. Estoy bien.

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good. [screams]
[Dylan] Hey. We went ahead and grouped the buoys into piles.
translation.es: Oye, agrupamos las boyas en pilas.

translation.en: That's yours, that's Tyler's, that's Lizzie's.
translation.es: Esas son para ti, Tyler y Lizzie.

translation.en: -Where are those guys? -[Dylan] They promised me
translation.es: ¿Dónde están? Dijeron que volveríanen cuanto terminaran

translation.en: they'd be right back
as soon as they finished doing the thing I told them not to do.
translation.es: con lo que les dije que no hicieran.

translation.en: So you just let them go?
No, I didn't let them. They just... didn't listen.
translation.es: No. No los dejé, solo... no me escucharon.

translation.en: Hey, that's not right. We're a team.
translation.es: Eso no está bien. Somos un equipo.

translation.en: We can't accomplish anything unless we're together.
-I'll go get them. -No, wait!
Seriously?
We can't be a team if everyone keeps leaving.
translation.es: No podemos ser un equiposi todos se van.

translation.en: -Why is nobody listening to me? -[Gina] Don't beat yourself up.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me escuchan? No te culpes.No es tu culpa que no te respeten.

translation.en: It's not your fault the team doesn't respect you.
translation.es: No te culpes.No es tu culpa que no te respeten.

translation.en: What, you think the team doesn't respect me?
-You think they do? -I did.
Well, they don't.
I ran out of bandages, so I had to get creative. Thanks, Lizzie.
translation.es: - No hay más vendas, tuve que improvisar.- Gracias, Lizzie.

translation.en: Uh, missed one. [chuckles]
[exhales] Okay.
Let's just get the supplies to prank Brody.
Ooh, grab that rope.
I have an idea.
Somebody's coming. We're not supposed to be in here. Hide!
[sighs] Hi, Eric.
[screams] They're alive?
I'm sorry about the mouth-to-mouth. I'd never done it before!
translation.es: Lamento lo de la respiraciónboca a boca.

translation.en: I didn't know you weren't supposed to use tongue! Eric... it's me.
translation.es: - ¡No sabía que no debía usar la lengua!- Eric, soy yo.

translation.en: [chuckles sheepishly] I knew that.
You guys, Dylan, Gina, and I have been doing all the work.
translation.es: Dylan, Gina y yo hacemos todo el trabajo.

translation.en: You gotta come help.
We are helping. We're getting Brody to back off.
But Dylan said--
Dylan wants us to do this. Then why did she tell you not to?
translation.es: - Dylan quiere que lo hagamos.- ¿Y por qué dijo que no?

translation.en: Think about it. She's the captain. She can't tell us to break the rules.
translation.es: Piénsalo. Es la capitana. No puede romper las reglas.Pero tampoco soporta a Brody.

translation.en: But she doesn't like Brody any more than we do.
translation.es: No puede romper las reglas.Pero tampoco soporta a Brody.

translation.en: -I don't know... -[Tyler] Well, I do!
-Tyler? Where are you? -[Tyler] Let's just say
I didn't jump into a bin full of fish hooks... [groaning] ...and I definitely didn't do it twice.
translation.es: Digamos que no salté a un cajón llenode anzuelos y que no lo hice dos veces.

translation.en: [whispers] Yes, he did.
Then, how am I supposed to get everyone to respect me as the captain?
translation.es: ¿Qué puedo hacer para que me respeten?

translation.en: First, stop asking questions like that. Captains don't ask.
translation.es: Primero, deja de hacer preguntas así.Eres la capitana.

translation.en: Okay, let's say you were captain. How would you--
You're asking again.
[scoffs] When was the last time anybody cleaned these things?
Half my team has bailed on me, Brody thinks I'm a joke...
translation.es: Mi equipo me abandona,Brody cree que soy una broma.

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this.
Gross.
You're right. Doubting yourself is gross! [sighs] But how can I not?
translation.es: Sí. Dudar de uno mismo es asqueroso.Pero ¿cómo no hacerlo?

translation.en: I mean, I've been here three summers. I know Junior Rescue inside and out.
translation.es: Estoy aquí desde hace tres veranos,conozco bien este lugar,

translation.en: I even made captain. Everyone still walks all over me.
translation.es: y me volví capitana,pero igual nadie me respeta.

translation.en: You better figure it out fast, 'cause we're the only ones working,
and these fins are disgusting.
-[ominous cello music playing] -Ew! What is that? Eel barf?
-[creature snarls] -[gasps] Something in here just moved!
What is that?
Wait. Those look like tentacles.
-[ominous music grows louder] -Is that what I think it is?
-Whoa. -[both panting]
You guys know you got stuff all over your face, right? [snickers]
translation.es: Saben que tienen algo en la cara, ¿no?

translation.en: That's it! I'm not doing this all summer! I'm taking him down.
translation.es: Se acabó. ¡No haré esto todo el verano! Lo destruiré.

translation.en: Gina, wait!
When Brody comes back to Tower One, he'll step into this net.
translation.es: Cuando Brody vuelva, pisará esta red,

translation.en: Which is attached to that parasail. All of which is attached to that Polaris.
translation.es: que está atada al paracaídas,que está atado al carro.

translation.en: I'll drive off, dragging Brody across Dog Beach,
translation.es: Arrastraré a Brody por la playa,

translation.en: the parasail will open, lifting him into the air and out over the ocean.
translation.es: el paracaídas se abriráy lo levantará sobre el océano.

translation.en: Then we'll release the rope, and kersploosh!
You can say "kersploosh, kersplat, kersplunk." It's still a ker-felony!
translation.es: Puedes decir "plaf" todo lo que quieras,¡pero es un delito!

translation.en: This is crazy!
Is it crazy or is it crazy?
I'm not hearing the difference.
-Eric, we're doing this for the team. -What team?
translation.es: - Lo hacemos por el equipo.- ¿Qué equipo?

translation.en: Ever since you decided to prank Brody, we haven't been a team.
translation.es: Desde que decidiste vengarteno somos un equipo.

translation.en: Somebody had to do something. Dylan didn't have a plan.
Yes, she did. You just didn't give it a chance.
translation.es: Sí, pero no le diste una oportunidad.

translation.en: You ignored her.
I didn't mean to.
Well, you did.
It's our first day, and we're already falling apart. Don't you get it?
translation.es: Nos desmoronamos en nuestro primer día.¿No entiendes?

translation.en: This is exactly what Brody wants.
translation.es: Es exactamente lo que Brody quiere.

translation.en: You're right.
Are you serious? We're bailing? Yeah. We should be helping our team.
translation.es: - ¿No lo haremos?- No, debemos ayudar a nuestro equipo.

translation.en: I'll take the Polaris back. Follow me, and you guys untie the net.
translation.es: Devolveré el carro. Desaten la red.

translation.en: There. Fine. Take it apart.
I wanna help you take down Brody. No, no, no, no, no! I just talked them out of it.
translation.es: - Quiero ayudarlos con Brody.- ¡No! Acabo de convencerlos.

translation.en: "Cleaning the outhouses." Sounds like a Tower Two job to me.
translation.es: "Limpiar las letrinas",otra tarea para la Torre Dos.

translation.en: What the...
Help me!
[yells] There's dog poo in my hair!
[sobbing] Things like this don't happen to Brody!
translation.es: Cosas así no le pasan a Brody.

translation.en: -Whoa! -[Brody] Help me!
Yes, it worked!
Uh, which is very bad.
Wait! No, Tyler! We didn't untie the net!
[Brody] Help!
What's going on? [screaming]
Help me!
Oh, no!
[Brody] Oh, I can see my tower from up here.
translation.es: Puedo ver mi torre desde aquí.

translation.en: [Brody] Ow, my boat key.
[gasps] What did you guys do?
Nothing! I thought we agreed we weren't gonna pull the prank. Why'd you make it so dangerous?
translation.es: - ¡Nada! Pensé que no lo haríamos.- ¿Por qué fue tan peligroso?

translation.en: -That's what I said. -It was Lizzie's idea.
translation.es: - Es lo que dije.- Fue idea de Lizzie.

translation.en: -Which worked beautifully, by the way. -[Dylan] Enough!
You guys have been ignoring me all day, and that ends now!
translation.es: Me ignoraron todo el día. Se acabó.

translation.en: I'm the captain. You're gonna do what I say, how I say it, when I say it.
translation.es: Soy la capitana, harán lo que les diga,cómo lo diga, cuándo lo diga.

translation.en: -You got a problem with that? -No.
No what?
No, Captain!
Tyler, Gina, we need something in case he falls.
translation.es: Tyler, Gina, busquen algo por si se cae.

translation.en: Lizzie, Eric, grab some rappelling gear and meet me at the Polaris.
translation.es: Lizzie, Eric,tomen un equipo de rapel y vengan.

translation.en: [Dylan] Come on, guys, let's go!
Once I hook the net, pull him up with the winch.
[Brody] Why is this happening? Help me! Help me!
Help!
Ow!
Brody, calm down, we're gonna save you.
You're running this rescue? Oh, great. I'm dead.
-[groans] -Will you stop? I got this. [shouting] Please! Someone!
Anybody else!  [crying] Tower Two is the worst!
translation.es: ¡Cualquier otra persona!¡La Torre Dos es la peor!

translation.en: [yells] What are you doing?
You're gonna leave us alone for the rest of the summer.
translation.es: Nos dejarás en paz el resto del verano.

translation.en: No, I'm not!
Whoa! Wait, wait, what are you doing? Are you crazy?
-Stop it! -I will.
If you stop giving us bad assignments. It has to be fair from now on.
translation.es: Si dejas de darnos malas tareas.A partir de ahora será justo.

translation.en: But I want to ruin your summer.
-[Dylan grunts] -[Brody] Okay, fine, fine! Fine! I'll stop, I'll stop. Just please...
Please get me out of here. [groans]
-[screams] -Get ready to pull him up!
Never mind!
[panting] I can't believe... we blew that up... by mouth.
translation.es: No puedo creer que lo inflamos...con la boca.

translation.en: -Why isn't there a pump for this thing? -[panting] There is.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no tiene bomba? Sí tiene.

translation.en: -[Brody grunting] -We just don't have... an extension cord.
translation.es: Pero no tenemos un cable tan largo.

translation.en: [shouting] She cut the rope! She's insane!
She cut the rope!
Who does that?
-[whistle jangles] -Ow! I fell on my whistle.
Yo, Dylan, I can't believe you dropped him. That was hardcore.
translation.es: Dylan, no puedo creer lo que hiciste.Fue extremo.

translation.en: You are crazy.
No, she's crazy.
Still don't hear it. Come on.
translation.es: - Aún no oigo la diferencia.- Vamos.

translation.en: That was a surprisingly baller move.
Well, I'm a surprisingly baller lady. [laughs]
Don't worry. I won't tell them it was an accident. Thanks. They're totally worshiping me right now.
translation.es: - No les diré que fue un accidente.- Gracias. Ahora me adoran.

translation.en: Hey, Dylan.
You're right. You're our captain, and maybe...
translation.es: Tienes razón. Eres nuestra capitana y, tal vez...

translation.en: there's kind of a possibility that... I should have listened to you today.
Is there anything you wanna say to me?
I agree. You should've listened to me.
Come on, let's finish our assignments.
Uh, I'm not going near those swim fins. An octopus peed on me today.
translation.es: No me acercaré a esas aletas.Ya me orinó un pulpo.

translation.en: Please tell me you washed your hands.
translation.es: Dime que te lavaste las manos.

translation.en: I did not.
Hope you don't mind. I gotta make a quick stop
translation.es: Debo hacer una parada rápidaen un bar mitzvá

translation.en: at Adam Schwartzman's bar mitzvah before I take you guys home.
translation.es: Debo hacer una parada rápidaen un bar mitzvá antes de llevarlos a casa.

translation.en: I'm Adam.  Today I became a man.
translation.es: Soy Adam, hoy me hice hombre.

translation.en: Put that arm around me, and you won't be one for long.
translation.es: Tócame y no lo serás más.

translation.en: [Vooch] Hey, guys.
Does anyone know where we're going? I'm not lost.
translation.es: ¿Alguien sabe a dónde vamos?No estoy perdido.

translation.en: -But I might be. -[engine sputtering]
♪ I was gonna be that one in a million ♪
